choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for 7 days.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews
Day 1: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado, dressed with lemon juice. Quinoa and steamed vegetables for dinner.
Day 2: Vegetable stir-fry with tofu or tempeh, broccoli, carrots, bell peppers, onions, garlic-free ginger sauce, served over brown rice.
Day 3: Greek yogurt parfaits with mixed berries and granola (use a brand that doesn't contain dairy). Grilled salmon for dinner.
Day 4: Chickpea and vegetable curry with quinoa or basmati rice, served with a side of cucumber raita (made without yogurt).
Day 5: Lentil soup with mixed greens and whole grain bread. Grilled chicken for dinner.
Day 6: Chia seed pudding with fresh fruit and honey-free agave syrup for dessert. Roasted vegetable pasta for dinner.
Day 7: Green smoothie bowl with avocado, mixed greens, banana, and almond milk (use a brand that doesn't contain dairy). Grilled shrimp or tofu stir-fry for dinner.
